name: Phanthasmagoric Hunt
description:
Phanthasmagoric Hunt is a pixel art action game in which you are a ghost hunter and you must eliminate as many ghosts as possible.

What can you do right now?

For now, in alpha version 0.1 you will be able to face 2 types of ghosts. To fight them, you'll use a coarse salt weapon, which instantly destroys them. You will have time to eliminate as many enemies as possible, the difficulty can be changed. To aid combat, you will have an EMF and Thermometer in your hand, which help to identify ghosts and spawn points.

What are the plans for the game? For future alpha update, I would like to do:
  • All game audio
  • New dark ghost
  • Better UI
  • Bigger map
For beta, I would like to do:
  • New map
  • Rescue Mode
  • Investigation Mode
  • Eliminate Mode
For release, I would like to do:
  • Career mode
  • More maps and enemies
  • New weapons and equipment
If everything goes VERY right
  • Multiplayer Ghosts vs Hunters
How will the game progress?

Well, I'm a 19 year old boy going to college. I've been on this project alone for 3 months and I do it in my spare time, it's my first game being released. I know the game still needs a lot to be something really interesting, but I decided to post it because I needed some feedback so I wouldn't get discouraged.
Any comment, be it a criticism or a compliment, please do, it will be very important to me and I will be very grateful.
Any financial support through donations will also be of great help.
These two things will show that my work is being recognized and that people really liked it. That way I will be motivated to continue. If you liked it, leave a comment, please, thank you so much! ;D

The game tutorial is in the book on the toolbar (it raises by clicking its handle) when the level starts. To scroll down the tutorial just place the cursor over the text and use the mouse scroll.

All fonts from fontenddev.com
